label: topic
comment: A code representing the topic of the sustainability claim. E.g. environment.deforestation, environment.ghg-emission-intensity, etc..  Drawn from a standard code list.

rangeIncludes.comment: A high level category scheme for conformity claims in the digital product passport

domainIncludes.comment: The SustainabilityClaim class represents specific claims regarding the sustainability of a product, providing details about the metrics, thresholds, and evidences supporting the claim.
